item.title: Idleness
item.description: It can seem sometimes, that we have a lot of time. We might feel like we’re wasting it, like we should be using this time productively, to better ourselves, to do something more meaningful. But are we just burdening ourselves with needless guilt. Our anxieties can make it seem like there are so many things to learn, so many things to experience, so many unexplored possibilities, we fear on missing out, chasing something, but what exactly we don’t really know…
